text:
Bug has been assigned.  One first attempt to look into it, could not reproduce
the problem.  Requesting that bug reporter please provide sample input and a
small main() that actually reproduces the problem, otherwise we may never be
able to identify the source of the problem.

Created attachment 254
addidional comments and log output (tomcat&console)
creator: wieland@netvertising.ch

text:
Changing status of bug to WORKSFORME because I cannot reproduce it and the
bug reporter has not responded to request for sample input and a main()
that reproduces problem.
creator: dfs@apache.org

text:
Never received sample code isolating the problem.  Am closing bug
since it could never be reproduced.
